Just a question like that, i tried setting my avatar in my profile and the only option i see is "Do not use an avatar [o]" but no choice to change anything... It's kinda frustrating :c

Any why i can't? Do i need more post counts or something?

Welcome to the forums!

It's basically a security measure; new users don't get any of the more advanced privileges such as avatars, signatures, etc. until they've been vetted by the moderation staff as not being a spambot or other such thing. Once you've had five posts approved by us, then you should be able to access those features.

Anyway, feel free to make yourself at home. Don't be afraid to ask questions or jump into an existing discussion that catches your fancy.
Welcome to the board! As Spec stated above, it is a security measure. At any rate, welcome aboard
I was wondering the same thing myself. Usually the capcha catches the spambots but I haven't ran a forum in a while so maybe the authors are getting more clever.
